author: Staff Reporter
text:
Selvapuram Police have arrested Manikandan (36) and Suresh (25) of charges of picking pockets in a bus in the city on Thursday. The police said that commuters of a bus on the Perur route caught and handed over the two of them.

They two had tried to escape after robbing commuter Sathyamurthy of Rs. 200. After inquiries the police said that Manikandan was a habitual offender and had been to jail several times.
title: Two pocket pickers arrested
